oai_dc:dc.dc:title: General Edmund Kirby Smith's camp kit
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This camp kit of eating utensils is reported to have belonged to Confederate General Edmund Kirby Smith and includes a spoon, knife, and fork. General Smith was commander of the Department of East Tennessee in 1862 and then became commander of the Trans-Mississippi department from 1863 until the end of the war when he surrendered the last military force of the Confederacy in May 1865. He served as professor of mathematics at the University of the South in Sewanee (Tenn) until his death in 1893.
